verbose_text: The combination of interferon-gamma and TNF-alpha stimulated the mRNA and protein secretion of CX3CL1 dependent on time and concentration, whereas dexamethasone significantly promoted the secretion of CX3CL1.
evidence: interferon-gamma and TNF-alpha stimulated the mRNA and protein secretion of CX3CL1 dependent on time and concentration, whereas dexamethasone significantly promoted the secretion of CX3CL1
